donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr: Consolidation and Expansion of the 'Directly Observed Treatment, Short Term' (DOTS) Program in Kyrgyzstan by Providing Access to Diagnostics and Treatment of Drug-Resistant Tuberculosis. The project will strengthen national institutional capacities to reduce the incidence and mortality rate of tuberculosis.

project_descr: Consolidation and Expansion of the 'Directly Observed Treatment, Short Term' (DOTS) Program in Kyrgyzstan by Providing Access to Diagnostics and Treatment of Drug-Resistant Tuberculosis.
project_title: DOTS TB PROGRAM Single Stream of Funding
